typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['output/2514e789-37b9-454a-95f9-6709e85c02e1.txt']) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
